eu.wauz.wauzcore.items

Class WauzRewards

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.WauzRewards

  • public class WauzRewards
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods to pay out currency rewards to players.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • daily

        public static void daily(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gives a player coins, based on their rank, if the cooldown is ready.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should claim their daily reward.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.characterDailyReward(Player), PlayerConfigurator.getRank(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterCoins(Player, long)

      • level

        public static int level(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        int tier,
                        double earnedxp)
        Gives experience points to the player and levels them up, if 100% is reached. Adds bonuses, based on level and passive stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the exp.
        tier - The tier (max player level) for the exp reward.
        earnedxp - The earned exp without modifiers.
        Returns:
        The exp amount to display.
        See Also:
        level(Player, int, double, Location, boolean)

      • level

        public static int level(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        int tier,
                        double earnedxp,
                        org.bukkit.Location location)
        Gives experience points to the player and levels them up, if 100% is reached. Adds bonuses, based on level and passive stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the exp.
        tier - The tier (max player level) for the exp reward.
        earnedxp - The earned exp without modifiers.
        location - The location for an exp indicator or null for none.
        Returns:
        The exp amount to display.
        See Also:
        level(Player, int, double, Location, boolean)

      • level

        public static int level(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        int tier,
                        double earnedxp,
                        org.bukkit.Location location,
                        boolean shared)
        Gives experience points to the player and levels them up, if 100% is reached. Adds bonuses, based on level and passive stats.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the exp.
        tier - The tier (max player level) for the exp reward.
        earnedxp - The earned exp without modifiers.
        location - The location for an exp indicator or null for none.
        shared - If the exp was already shared (25%) with group members.
        Returns:
        The exp amount to display.
        See Also:
        WauzCore.MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL, applyExperienceBonus(Player, double), ValueIndicator.spawnExpIndicator(Location, int), PlayerConfigurator.levelUpCharacter(Player), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterExperience(Player, double)

      • applyExperienceBonus

        private static double applyExperienceBonus(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                           double experience)
        Applies experience bonuses, based on the passive stats of the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that will earn the exp.
        experience - The exp without bonus.
        Returns:
        The exp with added bonus.
        See Also:
        EquipmentUtils.getExperienceBonus(ItemStack), PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetIntelligence(Player, int)

      • mmorpgToken

        public static void mmorpgToken(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Adds a token from MMORPG mode, if the limit of 30 has not been reached today.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the token.
        See Also:
        tokensEarnedToday(Player, String), token(Player, String, int, int)

      • survivalToken

        public static void survivalToken(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Adds a token from Survival mode, if the limit of 20 has not been reached today. Also resets the level to the maximum and increases the survival score by 1.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the token.
        See Also:
        tokensEarnedToday(Player, String), token(Player, String, int, int), WauzCore.MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL_SURVIVAL, PlayerConfigurator.setSurvivalScore(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer, long)

      • tokensEarnedToday

        private static int tokensEarnedToday(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                     java.lang.String mode)
        Gets the amount of tokens earned for the current date.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that earned the tokens.
        mode - The mode the tokens were earned in.
        Returns:
        The amount of tokens earned today.
        See Also:
        WauzDateUtils.getDateLong(), PlayerConfigurator.getTokenLimitDate(Player, String), PlayerConfigurator.getTokenLimitAmount(Player, String)

      • token

        private static void token(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          java.lang.String modeDisplay,
                          int earnedToday,
                          int maxToday)
        Adds a token from the given mode. Also updates the date for the daily limit and the amount earned today.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to receive the token.
        modeDisplay - The mode name, how it should be displayed.
        earnedToday - The amount of tokens earned today.
        maxToday - The maximum amount of tokens earnable per day.
        See Also:
        PlayerConfigurator.setTokenLimitDate(Player, String, long), PlayerConfigurator.setTokenLimitAmount(Player, String, int), PlayerConfigurator.setTokens(Player, long)
